channel.title: Windsurf on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Windsurf on See Hiong's Blog

item.title: Building an AI Knowledge Assistant
item.description: Learn how to build an AI-powered knowledge assistant using Python. This guide covers data ingestion from sources like PDFs, deploying a FastAPI-based API, and querying the assistant for detailed answers. Using advanced retrieval mechanisms, the assistant provides contextually relevant responses. You’ll also explore a working example with the CQRS design pattern. The complete project code is available on GitHub.
